topics.body:
Ok......

So, I browse KYM, like a normal day, and visited the forums, like a normal day, and I see a thread with a peculiar name:

*"Former KYM neo-nazi (& brony) plans mass Columbine-style shooting, gets arrested"*

No...This not a joke or a product of the riff raff users, yes this were real news.

Apparently, this old user was very well-know in KYM for her love for the Nazism and Fascism, and was quite famous for her peculiar threads. She also have a tumblr page, where she posted everything about Hitler or Nazi-related things.

_"Lindsay Kantha Souvannarath, from Geneva, Illinois, posted about her admiration of Hitler, the Columbine killers and other murderers on her Facebook page, Tumblr site and forums, and even hinted at the deadly plan, writing last Wednesday: ’Valentine’s Day. It’s going down.’"_

From The Daily Mail Reports

This is probably one of the most fucked up user that I have know in my entire life in the internet.
Checking her tumblr, or even her post in Know Your Meme are quite disturbing.
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358
